node.subtitle: Everything from personal care,

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Mental Health

We’re here to work alongside you to find your path in life with the supports you need to recover at your own pace. Everything from running a household to keeping a job, building friendships or being part of a community.

Life doesn’t always go to plan and we will stick by you. Plans are flexible to meet your changing needs as you gain new knowledge and skills. It might even include connecting and working with other organisations who can offer added value to your plan.

At the end of the day we’re in your corner and will work through it with you.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Soccer-loving teenager Joshua has been registered with Avivo for Family Support funding since May 2017.

Family Support funding was used by the family to support Josh to attend his soccer club and swimming lessons. He is an active young man and loves to socialise with his peers.

The funds have provided him with opportunities to connect with others and develop his understanding of working in a team. The activities also help with his coordination and strength.

His parents have engaged a support person to take Josh to some of these classes and allow Mum to spend time with her other son. This has been invaluable to her and her relationship with Joshua’s younger brother.

Josh recently attended the Special Olympics and his Mum sent an email of appreciation.

For many, working at Avivo is a calling and you get a great feeling that you’re part of something bigger.

Each day offers up its own challenges. It’s not always a picnic, but you get the chance to make a difference, working together with other team members who share your passion. At presen
